100.name: Faster Shooting
100.description: All weapons on board shoot faster.

400.name: Aircraft Carrier
400.description: Launches waves of fighter planes that strafe their targets and fire missiles at MOAB class Bloons.

500.name: Carrier Flagship
500.description: Does extra damage. Can place other Monkeys on the upper decks of the ship and increases attack speed of all water based Monkeys and Monkey Aces.

010.name: Grape Shot
010.description: Adds a spray of 5 sharpened grapes to the ship.

020.name: Hot Shot
020.description: Burning hot grape shot can pop Lead Bloons and set Bloons on fire.

030.name: Cannon Ship
030.description: Adds a powerful cannon that shoots out powerful bombs.

040.name: Monkey Pirates
040.description: Adds 2 cannons to the ship and cannon attacks do more damage. MOAB Takedown Ability: harpoons a MOAB class Bloon and brings it down.

050.name: Pirate Lord
050.description: Greatly increased attack speed for all attacks and can shoot 3 grappling hooks at once, plundering extra cash from each MOAB-class Bloon taken down.

001.name: Long Range
001.description: Much longer range and projectiles fly faster.

002.name: Crow's Nest
002.description: Allows the ship to hit Camo Bloons.

004.name: Favored Trades
004.description: Attacks faster and generates lots of money per round. Monkeys in radius have increased sell value.

005.name: Trade Empire
005.description: Generates more cash per round, increases cash earned by up to 20 other Merchantmen by the number of Merchantmen, and boosts all Merchantmen damage.

600.name: Navarch of the Seas
600.description: The greatest thing ever to float on water.
